description: SpaceX’s Falcon 9 achieved Florida’s 100th launch of 2025, carrying 29 Starlink satellites into low Earth orbit. The milestone reflects a surge in launch cadence driven by reusable rockets, satellite constellations, and expanding commercial demand, marking one of the busiest years ever on the Space Coast.
title: SpaceX Launches Falcon 9 With 29 Starlink Satellites, Marks Florida’s 100th Space Coast Launch of 2025

description: Webb’s mid-infrared images of Apep reveal a rare triple-star system producing vast carbon-rich dust spirals from colliding stellar winds. The two Wolf–Rayet stars and a distant supergiant create layered shells that record centuries of activity and enrich the galaxy with elements vital for future stars and planets.
title: Webb’s Stunning View of Apep Shows a Rare Triple-Star System Wrapped in Spirals

description: A new isotopic study reveals that Theia—the Mars-sized body that struck Earth 4.5 billion years ago to form the Moon—likely originated in the inner Solar System, close to Earth’s birthplace. By comparing heavy-element isotope ratios in lunar rocks, Earth samples, and meteorites, researchers found identical signatures, showing both worlds formed from the same inner-disk material. Mass-balance models confirm Theia and Earth grew as near neighbors before their catastrophic collision.
title: Study Traces Moon-Forming Impact to an Inner Solar System Neighbour Named Theia

description: When LIGO and Virgo detected GW231123 in late 2023, it appeared to show two black holes merging in the so-called mass gap, where theory predicted none should exist. But new simulations indicate that rapidly spinning, strongly magnetized massive stars can collapse into black holes without exploding entirely. This process sheds enough mass to leave behind black holes of exactly the sizes observed, resolving the mystery behind the “forbidden” merger.
title: Scientists Solve the Mystery Behind LIGO’s “Forbidden” Black Hole Pair

description: NASA is preparing an unprecedented mission to save the Neil Gehrels Swift Observatory, a key gamma-ray burst monitor launched in 2004 but now rapidly losing altitude. Partnering with Katalyst Space Technologies, NASA will send a robotic servicer on a Pegasus XL rocket to rendezvous with Swift, inspect it, and raise it to a stable orbit. The effort preserves vital GRB observations and demonstrates a new era of commercial satellite life-extension missions.
title: NASA Launches Rescue Mission to Save the Swift Gamma-Ray Burst Observatory

description: Matt Smith stars in The Death of Bunny Munro, a powerful new dark comedy series now streaming on JioHotstar. With strong IMDb ratings and an emotional, unpredictable storyline, the show blends humour and heartbreak through a father-son road trip filled with chaos and self-reflection.
title: The Death of Bunny Munro Now Streaming on JioHotstar

description: Bison Kaalamaadan is a compelling Tamil sports-action film that follows a kabaddi player rising from oppression to strength. Directed by Mari Selvaraj and led by Dhruv Vikram’s intense performance, the film blends emotion, social issues and powerful storytelling. Now streaming worldwide on Netflix.
title: Bison Kaalamaadan Now Streaming on Netflix, A Must-Watch Tamil Sports Drama

description: The Bengal Files, directed by Vivek Agnihotri, surrounding the 1946 Great  Calcutta killings and the Naokhali riots, the incident resulting in widespread violence and displacement of families, is now streaming on ZEE5.
title: The Bengal Files Now Premiering on ZEE5: Everything You Need to Know

description: The Family Man Season 3 brings a fresh wave of suspense, intense action and emotional drama. With Manoj Bajpayee leading a new mission, the series unfolds a dangerous conspiracy tied to the Northeast. Now streaming on Amazon Prime, the show is receiving strong praise for storyline and performances.
title: The Family Man Season 3 is Now Streaming on Amazon Prime Video: What You Need to Know

description: Starring Ishaan Khatter and Vishal Jethwa in the lead roles, Homebound is an intense drama film that explores the themes of caste discrimination, political conflicts, and struggles.
title: Homebound Now Available for Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: Rolling Loud India brings its high-energy music festival experience to your screens through JioHotstar. Streaming live on November 22 and 23 from 7 PM onwards, the event delivers powerful performances and festival vibes right at home. While the live broadcast has no IMDb rating, fans can enjoy uninterrupted music and global hip-hop culture across two thrilling nights.
title: Rolling Loud India to Go Live on JioHotstar Today: What You Need to Know About this Live Music Festival
